stem: Given question: Where can a human find body coverings? and answer: clothing store, explain why in
no_more_50_words: Human bodies are usually covered using clothes, which can be found for sale at clothing stores.
50_to_100_words: A human can find body coverings at a clothing store because clothing stores specialize in selling various types of garments, which are used to cover the body. These garments, commonly known as clothes, are made from a variety of fabrics and materials, and come in different styles, sizes, and designs. Some clothing stores may also sell accessories, such as scarves, hats, and gloves, which can also be used to cover the body. Clothing stores are able to offer a wide selection of body coverings because they are specifically designed to meet the needs of customers who are looking for clothing and accessories to cover their bodies.
